Class yae.Quad

A quadrilateral (a polygon with four sides and four corners) with texture coordinate information.

Methods

yae.Quad.getViewport (self) Gets the current viewport of this Quad.
yae.Quad.setViewport (self, x, y, w, h) Sets the texture coordinates according to a viewport.


Methods

yae.Quad.getViewport (self)
Gets the current viewport of this Quad.

Parameters:

  • self Quad

Returns:

  1. number x The top-left corner along the x-axis.
  2. number y The top-right corner along the y-axis.
  3. number w The width of the viewport.
  4. number h The height of the viewport.

Usage:

    x, y, width, height = Quad\getViewport!
yae.Quad.setViewport (self, x, y, w, h)
Sets the texture coordinates according to a viewport.

Parameters:

  • self Quad
  • x number The top-left corner along the x-axis.
  • y number The top-right corner along the y-axis.
  • w number The width of the viewport.
  • h number The height of the viewport.

Usage:

    Quad\setViewport x, y, width, height
